Package edu.ncsu.csc216.product_backlog.model.product

Class Product

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.product_backlog.model.product.Product
public class Product extends Object
The product class manages a list of tasks under it Contains an ArrayList of tasks that represent the tasks that are needed to be completed for the product
Author:
Ethan Browne

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Product(String name)
    Creates a product and sets the name, counter to 0, and creates an empty task list
